channel.title: Go on Pierre Zemb

item.title: Why you really should give Golang a try!
item.description: As you may or may not know, Golang is a new programming language created by Google. It’s great for writing high-performance, concurrent server applications and tools. With it, you can easily write your own web server to render your static HTML files, or go deeper and create a REST services. package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("hello world") } Go’s Hello World Go has many advantages over languages like good-old Java, C++ or add your favorite language here.
